text: Britain's Next top Model, Cycle 4 is the fourth season of Britain's Next Top Model. This cycle includes 14 contestants. The winner was 18-year old Alex Evans. ==Contestants== (ages stated are at time of contest) Contestant Age Hometown Outcome Sophie Roberts 18 Kings Lynn, England 14th Musayeroh Barrie 20 London, England 13th Louise Heywood 20 Rochdale, England 12th Lauren Donaldson-Stanley 18 Portsmouth, England 11th Lynzi Arnott 24 Aldershot, England 10th Lisa-Jane "Lisa" Fowler 22 Potters Bar, England 9th Martha Braddell 18 Oxford, England 8th/7th Leanne Nagle 18 Colchester, England Aaron Hunt 18 Nottingham, England 6th Charlotte Denton 20 Liverpool, England 5th Rachael Cairns 19 Leeds, England 4th Stefanie Wilson 22 London, England 3rd Catherine Thomas 18 Folkestone, England Runner-up Alexandra "Alex" Evans 18 Cranleigh, England Winner ==Prizes== * A modeling contract with Models 1 * A Revlon Cosmetics Campaign * A spread & cover in Company Magazine ==Episodes== 1\. casting episode 2\. *Best: Rachael Cairns *Worst: Aaron Hunt & Sophie Roberts *Eliminated: Sophie Roberts 3\. *Best: Lisa Fowler *Worst: Alex Evans & Musayeroh Barrie *Eliminated: Musayeroh Barrie 4\. *Best: Rachael Cairns *Worst: Louise Heywood & Lauren Donaldson-Stanley *Eliminated: Louise Heywood 5\. *Best: Charlotte Denton *Worst: Lisa Fowler & Lauren Donaldson-Stanley *Eliminated: Lauren Donaldson-Stanley 6\. *Best: Stefanie Wilson *Worst: Lisa Fowler & Lynzi Arnott *Eliminated: Lynzi Arnott 7\. *Best: Leanne Nagle *Worst: Lisa Fowler & Charlotte Denton *Eliminated: Lisa Fowler 8\. *Best: Catherine Thomas *Worst: Leanne Nagle & Martha Braddell *Eliminated: Leanne Nagle & Martha Braddell 9\. *Best: Stefanie Wilson *Worst: Charlotte Denton & Aaron Hunt *Eliminated: Aaron Hunt 10\. *Best: Alex Evans *Worst: Charlotte Denton & Stefanie Wilson *Eliminated: Charlotte Denton 11\. *Best: Rachael Cairns *Worst: Alex Evans & Catherine Thomas *Eliminated: None 12\. *Best: Alex Evans *Worst: Rachael Cairns & Stefanie Wilson *Eliminated: Rachael Cairns 13\. *Final Three: Alex Evans, Catherine Thomas & Stefanie Wilson *Eliminated: Stefanie Wilson *Final Two: Alex Evans & Catherine Thomas *Winner: Alex Evans Category:Britain's Next Top Model
title: Britain's Next Top Model, Cycle 4
